nodes.text: Tresk Ortola was a New Republic officer who had served with the Rebel Alliance. Upon graduating from the Academy, Ortola had joined the merchant marine and then the Rebellion. He served as the first officer on a Rebel gunship before being promoted to command the corvette NovaFlare. Ortola and his ship participated in the assault on the Maw Installation and were instrumental in the destruction of the Imperial MCPS weapon.
